Hometex has been manufacturing in Canada since 1952, servicing small independent stores, artisans and home-based businesses. Specializing in pillow inserts, fabrics, home goods and promotional items.

We manufacture a wide variety of products under private brands and within our well-loved family of brands: Dreamfit®, Sovereign America™, and FitRite® · Our passion for innovation and superior design, workmanship and materials has led to several HomTex patents on many exciting new products ...

Our passion for innovation and superior design, workmanship and materials has led to several HomTex patents on many exciting new products that enhance comfort and performance · In 1987, we were making our first sheets, cut and sewn by family members into many late nights.
